learnings.title: Dev Launcher Comprehensive Guide
learnings.description: Consolidated learnings for dev launcher setup, configuration, and troubleshooting

learning.problem: Backend fails with "SECRET_KEY must be at least 32 characters"
learning.solution: Generate 64+ character key: python -c "import secrets; print(secrets.token_urlsafe(48))" Update in both .env and .env.development.local Ensure DevelopmentConfig reads from environment
learning.prevention: Always use 64+ character keys, keep .env files synchronized

learning.problem: Environment loader warns about missing LLM API keys
learning.note: Placeholders satisfy checks when LLM_MODE=shared (mocked mode)

learning.problem: Services connect to cloud endpoints despite local Docker services
learning.solution: Set all service modes to local in .env: REDIS_MODE=local CLICKHOUSE_MODE=local REDIS_HOST=localhost CLICKHOUSE_HOST=localhost DEV_MODE_*_ENABLED=true

learning.problem: Alembic fails: "Could not determine revision id from filename"
learning.solution: 1. Create app/alembic/migrations_helpers/ directory 2. Move all helper files (*_tables.py, migration_metadata.py) there 3. Only keep proper migration files in versions/
learning.prevention: Never place non-migration files in alembic/versions/

learning.problem: Migrations fail with "attempted relative import with no known parent package"
learning.solution: Convert all relative imports to absolute: FROM: from ..migrations_helpers.migration_metadata import TO: from app.alembic.migrations_helpers.migration_metadata import

learning.problem: Schema validation fails with missing tables
learning.solution: 1. Check status: alembic current 2. Generate: alembic revision --autogenerate -m "description" 3. Review migration file 4. Apply: alembic upgrade head
learning.common_missing_tables: agent_state_transactions, corpus_audit_logs, agent_state_snapshots, mcp_tool_executions, mcp_external_servers, agent_recovery_logs

learning.problem: DatabaseMetrics instantiation fails with unexpected arguments
learning.solution: Ensure DatabaseMetrics has all fields MetricsCollector passes: - Add pool_size and pool_overflow fields - Fix parameter mismatches (query_count â†’ total_queries) - Add required timestamp parameter

learning.problem: Health checks timeout during database optimization
learning.root_cause: Database optimization takes 10-15 seconds on startup
learning.solution: Extended timeouts: - Auth: 30s - Backend: 30s - Frontend: 60s - Service startup: 30-50s - Overall: 120s

learning.problem: Health checks use hardcoded ports instead of dynamic ports
learning.solution: Read ports from .service_discovery/*.json files Use actual allocated ports for health checks Fall back to defaults if files missing

learning.problem: Health checks fail when optional services unavailable
learning.solution: Make environment-aware: - PostgreSQL: critical in all environments - Redis/ClickHouse: optional in development - Check environment: os.getenv("ENVIRONMENT", "development")
Use correct method name: run_quick_checks() Update all references in startup_sequencer.py and launcher_integration.py

learning.recommendation: Warnings can be safely ignored in development

learning.insight: LLM API keys optional for basic development

best_practices.practice: Always check startup logs for critical vs non-critical failures
Use absolute imports in Alembic migrations
Read dynamic ports from service discovery files
Set timeouts based on worst-case startup times
Monitor actual startup times to adjust timeouts

testing_checklist.item: Schema validation passes or shows only warnings

troubleshooting.issue: Move helper files out of alembic/versions/
